org.seedstack.i18n

Interface LocaleService


  • @Service
public interface LocaleService
    This service allows to manage the application's locales. A locale is just a String identifying a region. Some examples include fr-FR, en-GB, en-US-pouet, zn, any string you want to use.
    Author:
    yves.dautremay@mpsa.com

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addLocale(String locale)
      Adds a new available locale.
      void changeDefaultLocaleTo(String locale)
      Changes the current default locale.
      void deleteLocale(String locale)
      Deletes an available locale.
      Set<String> getAvailableLocales()
      Returns all the available locales for the application.
      String getClosestLocale(String locale)
      Returns the closest locale from the given locale which is supported by the application.
      String getDefaultLocale()
      Returns the application's default locale.
      Set<String> getSupportedLocales()
      Returns all the locales supported by the platform.
      boolean isAvailable(String localeCode)
      Indicates whether the locale is available.

    • Method Detail

      • isAvailable

        boolean isAvailable(String localeCode)
        Indicates whether the locale is available. Returns false if the given code is null.
        Parameters:
        localeCode - the locale code, e.g. "fr-BE"
        Returns:
        true is the locale exists, false otherwise.

      • getAvailableLocales

        Set<String> getAvailableLocales()
        Returns all the available locales for the application.
        Returns:
        a set with all the locales.

      • getSupportedLocales

        Set<String> getSupportedLocales()
        Returns all the locales supported by the platform.
        Returns:
        a set with the supported locales.

      • getDefaultLocale

        String getDefaultLocale()
        Returns the application's default locale.
        Returns:
        The default locale or null if there is no default locale

      • getClosestLocale

        String getClosestLocale(String locale)
        Returns the closest locale from the given locale which is supported by the application.
        Parameters:
        locale - The locale to match.
        Returns:
        The supported locale or null if there is no close locale

      • changeDefaultLocaleTo

        void changeDefaultLocaleTo(String locale)
        Changes the current default locale.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to define as default.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the locale is null.

      • addLocale

        void addLocale(String locale)
        Adds a new available locale.

        Does nothing if locale already exists.

        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to add.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the locale argument is null.

      • deleteLocale

        void deleteLocale(String locale)
        Deletes an available locale.

        Does nothing if the given locale does not exist.

        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to delete.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the locale argument is null.
